description:
The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and evolve their business through the use of Google’s global network, web-scale data centers and software infrastructure. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.

As many institutions, agencies and other businesses begin their journey of understanding into how the cloud can be a transformation agent, you and your team become their trusted advisor to facilitate their ability to realize maximum business value from Google Cloud.

As a Customer Engineering Manager, you will lead a team of pre-sales Engineers who engage with sales prospects and channel partners to understand and assess customer requirements, prepare and present demonstrations of Google’s Cloud technologies and address and overcome technical objections that arise throughout the sales process. You will lead efforts to drive champion and solution innovation, working across the organization to identify the right assets and tools to drive customer adoption.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
  • 10 years of experience serving in the capacity of a technical sales engineer in a cloud computing environment or equivalent experience in a customer facing role.
  • People management experience, managing a team and attracting and growing talent.
  • Technical experience with modern IT architectures, operations and development in the cloud computing market.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Computer Science and/or a MBA.
  • 10 years of experience selling complex IT solutions.
  • Demonstrated understanding of solution architecture within web and mobile environments and technical experience of web/internet related technologies.
  • Ability to effectively present to both technical and non-technical audiences, engaging C-Level in business and technology transformation.
  • Ability to inspire and grow teams to their full potential. Ability to influence cross-functional teams to achieve common business objectives.
  • Demonstrated organizational and project management capabilities.
responsibilities:
• Lead a high performance team by recruiting talent and coach the team to deliver against assigned goals while prioritizing on outstanding customer experience. Create and drive innovative programs that focus on achieving growth.
  • Meet with customers/prospects and participate directly in key executive meetings, agreements and accounts within the region. Work directly with customers to ensure optimized and increased use of Google Cloud.
  • Prepare and deliver product messaging in an effort to highlight Google Cloud Platform value proposition. Manage and lead product and solution briefings. Deliver your point of view for future state solution architecture, integration, application platforms while balancing and articulating the business benefits of the approach.
  • Drive the Systems Engineering team to lead all technical sales activities and manage customer deployment and operations. Take full responsibility for technical aspects of solutions.
  • Lead the System Engineering team to enable and grow channel partners for technical sales, customer deployment and operations.
title: Customer Engineering Manager, Google Cloud Customers
